heading: Punjab Pulse: Unveiling the Vibrant Tapestry

itinerary.day1Overview: Your wonderful expedition to Amritsar will start with your arrival at Amritsar railway station/airport, whichever of your choice. At the station/airport, our representative will be waiting to escort you to a pre-booked hotel. After getting freshened up, be ready to go on an Amritsar sightseeing tour. On the tour, visit the famous five sacred Sarovar (ponds). The first stop on this day sightseeing is Sri Harmandir Sahib, also known as Golden Temple. It is one of the highly revered Sikh shrines in Punjab. The gurdwara includes a sacred pond, known as Sarovar. Followed by this, visit Gurdwara Santokshar Sahib which houses one of the five historical Sarovar - Santokshar Sarovar. Thereafter, visit Gurdwara Ramsar where you will be also visiting the Ramsar Sarovar - the smallest of all five ponds. Built in the year 1885, the gurudwara marks the place where the fifth Sikh Guru - Guru Arjan Dev wrote Guru Granth Sahib - the sacred scripture. Thereafter, visit the Gurdwara Shri Mata Kaulsar Sahib which houses Kaulsar Sarovar. Dedicated to Mata Kaulan Ji, the gurdwara is another significant Sikh sacred site in Amritsar. From there, you will be taken to Gurdwara Bibeksar Sahib where you will find the fifth pond, Bibeksar Sarovar. Built in the year 1628 by the sixth Sikh Guru - Hargobind Sahib, the Sarovar is one of the sacred sites in the region. In the evening, you will be transferred back to the same hotel for dinner and overnight stay.

itinerary.day2Overview: In the morning, you will be served with a scrumptious breakfast. Followed by this, begin a drive to Jalandhar which would be a 2-3 hours drive. Upon arrival in the city, you will be transferred to a pre-booked hotel in Jalandhar. After getting freshened up, be ready to go on a sightseeing tour of Jalandhar. On the tour, visit Pushpa Gujral Science City, Gurdwara Chhevin Padshahi, Devi Talab Mandir, and Rangla Punjab Haveli. After the day sightseeing tour, you will be taken back to the hotel in the evening. Dinner and overnight stay will be provided at the hotel.

itinerary.day3Overview: Enjoy a delectable breakfast in the morning. After that, be ready to commence a road drive to Ludhiana which would take 2-3 hours to complete. On your arrival in Ludhiana, you will be accommodated in a pre-booked hotel in Ludhiana. After getting freshened up, you will be taken on a sightseeing tour of Ludhiana. On this tour, you will explore some top tourist attractions of the city like Gurdwara Dukh Niwaran Sahib and Nehru Rose Garden. In the evening, you will be taken back to the hotel for dinner and overnight stay.

itinerary.day4Overview: Like all days, enjoy a nutritious morning meal. Followed by this, commence a road drive to Patiala. This would be a 2-3 hours drive. Upon arrival, you will be accommodated in a pre-booked hotel in Patiala. Get freshen up and be ready to go out for a sightseeing tour in Patiala. On the sightseeing tour, visit popular places like Qila Mubarak Complex, Sheesh Mahal, and Gurdwara Dukh Nivaran Sahib. In the evening, return to the hotel for dinner and overnight stay.

itinerary.day5Overview: Post breakfast, check-out from the hotel and be ready to begin a road drive to Chandigarh. The distance between Patiala and Chandigarh is 69 km. Upon arrival, you will be transferred to a pre-booked hotel in Chandigarh. After getting freshened up, commence a day sightseeing tour of Chandigarh. On this tour, you will be taken to some top tourist attractions of the city including Rock Garden, Rose Garden, and Sukhna Lake. In the evening, enjoy a shopping tour in the market of sector 17. Thereafter, head back to the hotel. Dinner and overnight stay will be provided at the hotel.

itinerary.day6Overview: Start your morning with a delicious breakfast. Followed by this, check-out from the hotel and be ready to begin a road drive to Anandpur Shaib. This would be a 2-3 hours drive. On your arrival in Anandpur Sahib, you will be taken to a pre-booked hotel to get freshened up. Thereafter, you will be taken out for a sightseeing tour of Anandpur Sahib. On the tour, you will first visit the popular pilgrimage site of Gurdwara Shri Kesgarh. Thereafter, visit Kesgarh Sahib and Bhakra Nangal Dam. In the evening, return to the hotel in Anandpur Sahib. Dinner and overnight stay will be provided at the hotel.

itinerary.day7Overview: In the morning, enjoy the last delectable breakfast of this tour. Post breakfast, be ready with your backpacks as you will be transferred to the railway station/airport. Board your train/flight either to the onward destination or to the home destination.

overView.heading: Punjab Panorama: Diving into Rich Cultural Heritage
overView.text: Embark on an enchanting expedition through the heart of Punjab, experiencing its rich culture and heritage. Immerse yourself in a tapestry of traditions, historical marvels, and vibrant markets, creating a harmonious blend of the past and the present.

overView.heading: Historical Grandeur in Amritsar
overView.text: Uncover the historical treasures of Amritsar. Explore iconic landmarks, witness architectural splendor, and absorb the lively vibes of this historical city, echoing tales of Sikhism, British colonial influence, and cultural richness.

overView.heading: Cultural Extravaganza in Jalandhar
overView.text: Discover the cultural richness of Jalandhar. Immerse yourself in traditional arts, explore historic structures, and embrace the vibrant charm of this city, where the past seamlessly merges with contemporary life.

overView.heading: Natural Retreat: Ropar Wetland
overView.text: Delve into the natural beauty of Ropar Wetland. Explore the serene landscapes, known for their lush greenery and diverse birdlife. Immerse yourself in the peaceful surroundings and revel in the tranquility of this natural sanctuary.

overView.heading: Gastronomic Journey through Punjab
overView.text: Embark on a culinary odyssey through Punjab. Relish local specialties like makki di roti, sarson da saag, and Amritsari kulcha. Navigate through bustling markets, savor authentic Punjabi cuisine, and indulge in the diverse flavors of this vibrant state.

overView.heading: Preserving Cultural Heritage in Ludhiana
overView.text: Punjab is dedicated to preserving its cultural legacy. From promoting traditional arts to conserving ancient structures, the state strives to protect its rich heritage, ensuring a cultural spectacle for both locals and visitors.

overView.heading: Plan Your Punjab Exploration
overView.text: Whether captivated by history, cultural diversity, or culinary delights, Punjab promises an immersive journey. Plan your exploration in this dynamic state, where every street echoes tales of valor, and every moment is a celebration of Punjab's vibrant spirit.
